name: The 7 Spiritual Laws of Verification by drrrrck x Patrick Amadon

metadata.name: The 7 Spiritual Laws of Verification by drrrrck x Patrick Amadon 1
metadata.description:
What is success? Who gets to be verified? Between the concepts of verification (as questioned by Jack Butcher in Checks VV) and the 7 Spiritual Laws of Success by Deepak Chopra NFT, this series of 7 pieces explores how culture, memes, and artistic expression can overlap to create value.

The success of these 7 pieces may or may not be notable.

properties.name: The 7 Spiritual Laws of Verification by drrrrck x Patrick Amadon
